desc: MEDFORD: A human and machine readable markup language to facilitate FAIR coral metadata
Note: A paper describing the implementation of the MEDFORD file format, which has a parser that can take a provided MEDFORD file and additional arbitrary files and put them into a bag. A MEDFORD file can also be translated into other formats, such as the BCODMO submission format.
